plot outline: 6ne Maili Inspired by true incidents. At the dense sanctuaries of the Western Ghats which houses 'Dhavalgiri', a trekking zone, the cinema opens when two groups on a trekking expedition go missing at the '6th mile'. Are these untraceable hikers dead? Are they alive? Will they ever return? Who is responsible for their disappearance? The big reveal of the answers to all these questions is the story of '6ne Maili' Interesting plot twists with Naxal intervention, dacoits, police activities, SIT- special investigation teams add to the mysterious extravaganza of the cinema.
title: 6ne Maili
plot: The sudden disappearance of a group of people in the forest of Dhavalgir hovers at the 6th mile of the trekking zone.

_6ne Maili_ (qv) Inspired by true incidents. Are these untraceable hikers dead? Are they alive? Will they ever return? Who is responsible for their disappearance? The big reveal of the answers to all these questions is the story of '_6ne Maili_ (qv)' Interesting plot twists with Naxal intervention, dacoits, police activities, SIT- special investigation teams add to the mysterious extravaganza of the cinema.::sai kiran
